headline: GLOBALFOUNDRIES Inc. (GFS): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on GLOBALFOUNDRIES Inc. on Ridire Research’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on GFS. GLOBALFOUNDRIES Inc.’s share was trading at $35.88 as of December 1st. GFS’s trailing and forward P/E were 28.10 and 18.02 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. headline: Parsons Won’t Be Fixing the Air-Traffic Control Mess. Its Stock Is Tumbling.
summary: Shares of government contractor  Parsons  were down early Friday after the government selected someone else to update America’s air-traffic control system.  Investors thought that the business was going to Parsons.  The stock slid 25% to $63.36 in midday trading.

raw.headline: Parsons Won’t Be Fixing the Air-Traffic Control Mess. Its Stock Is Tumbling.

headline: IBM Designated as a Critical Third-Party Provider Under EU DORA
summary: The Digital Operational Resilience Act (DORA) is a European Union regulation designed to ensure that financial entities—such as banks, insurance companies, and investment firms—and their critical Information and Communication Technology (ICT) providers can withstand and recover from technology disruptions, including cyber incidents and technical failures.

raw.headline: IBM Designated as a Critical Third-Party Provider Under EU DORA

headline: Leon Stok of IBM Elected Chair of Silicon Integration Initiative Board
summary: AUSTIN, Texas, December 05, 2025--The Silicon Integration Initiative (Si2) today announced that Dr. Leon Stok, Vice President of Electronic Design Automation at IBM, has been elected Chair of the Si2 Board of Directors for the remainder of the 2025–2026 term.
